duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage capital improvement projects through planning, design, construction, and closeout.
Lead and coordinate project teams, contractors, and stakeholders to ensure successful project delivery.
Develop project plans, schedules, and budgets, and monitor progress to meet project goals and objectives.
Evaluate project risks and issues, and implement effective mitigation strategies.
Communicate project updates, timelines, and milestones to project stakeholders and senior management.
Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, building codes, and project specifications.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Project Management, Construction Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
